abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Agricultural Competitiveness Project is to increase the
            competitiveness of the agricultural sector in Kazakhstan.
            The main reason for the cancellation of funds, as requested
            by the Borrower on June 17, 2011, is the decision to
            postpone the construction of the National Reference
            Laboratory (NRL). The cancellation will amount to
            US$9,300,000 from the original amount of US$24,000,000, from
            the Loan Categories Unallocated (US$1,000,000), Civil Works
            (US$5,300,000), and Goods (US$3,000,000).
